page.title: 16Events in Aston Clinton
page.content: There are lots of different entertainments that go on in Aston Clinton through the year. There are the A.C.Colts who practice football at Aston Clinton Park. They have refreshments at the youth club, for both players and spectators. On every other Saturday there is an antique sale at the Anthony Hall. There is the Horticultural Show which is held at Rookery House. Usually there are different stalls and art competitions, home produce, flowers, Fancy Dress and vegetables. Discos are held at the Anthony Hall every month. The price is 60p a ticket, age 7-13. Parents supervise everyone. On Thursday nights 1st Aston Clinton Scout group meet to play games and work on badges. They are a very good troop.
